籤詩版本二:
Mentingji anofara zvikuru, uye suo remabasa akanaka rinobudirira.
Zvinhu zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka mumunda wewanano, uye kana chirwere chikasangana nemushonga unoshamisa, iwe uchapora
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra kurota kwechirimo nemazana emaruva.
Zvese zvakanaka kana wasangana nemunhu anokudzwa.

(Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekupemberera kwakanaka.
Zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka.
)
解曰: Chirimo chakadzika uye zuva rinodziya. Maruva anotumbuka ega. Usazeza. Kuonekwa kubva kuvanhu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zuva rekuzvarwa kwaGuo Fenyang
Guo Ziyi, mukuru mukuru weTang Dynasty naMambo weFenyang, vakaita mabiko ekuzvarwa. Hama neshamwari dzakauya kuzokorokotedza, uye mamiriro acho akanga akazara nemufaro nemufaro.
聖意: Musha wemhuri uri budiriro, iye pachake anochengeteka, upfumi hunobudirira, bhizimisi rinobudirira, roorano inobudirira, Liujia inodzivisa mashura, vanofamba netsoka vanoenda kuminda, honye dzesadza dzakapfuma, zvipfuwo zvinobudirira, vanhu vawanikwa, matare edzimhosva. akakunda, kutama kunobudirira, pfuma yakarasika inotsvakwa nekukurumidza, kurwara ndiAnshan, guva rakanaka,
第X籤: Makumi matanhatu nesere: Kuhwina iyo Lottery (Lottery)
